articles.title: Here's Why Antibody Tests Won't End Coronavirus Lockdowns Anytime Soon - VICE
articles.description: Testing for coronavirus antibodies is extremely unreliable right now. And even if doctors were able to reliably detect antibodies, too much is unknown about how immunity from COVID-19 actually works.
articles.content:
No one knows whether having coronavirus antibodies makes people immune, but that isnt stopping governors from citing dubious test results to bolster their case that its time to get back to normal.
